titleStmt.title: A iudicious and painefull exposition vpon the ten Commandements wherein the text is opened, questions and doubts are resolued, errours confuted, and sundry instructions effectually applied. First deliuered in seuerall sermons, and now published to the glory of God, and for the further benefit of his church. By Peter Barker, preacher of Gods word, at Stowre Paine, in Dorsetshire.
titleStmt.author: Barker, Peter, preacher of Gods word.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By J. Beale?] for Roger Iackson, and are to be sold at his shop neer the great Conduit in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; leaves X2-3 lacking; some print faded and show-through.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop neer the great Conduit in Fleet-street
